title: Person of Interest - 4x09 - Scarface
author: YT.POI
comment: "You think that changes anything? I still won."... "Then why aren't you smiling?" I love that exchange.

I love Elias, he's so different from his origins. His mob boss daddy, would let all of his men die for the sake of profit, but Elias, wants to save his people. A leader without people, is not leader at all.

May I just say: this has been one of the best episodes so far all season. I loved the character of Elias, but after this episode I loved him even more. And the character of Anthony Marconi, AKA Scarface... you know I never really gave him a second thought until this episode. I was always under the impression that he was a hired gun off the street that became very loyal to Elias. I had no idea that he and Elias were friends to the point that they would straight up die for each other. Oh my gosh. I hate the fact that they killed him right when I was starting to like him. Morior Invictus.
"Why aren't you smilling?" Always find the exactely right answer that show his intelligence and class.
description:
PERSON OF INTEREST - Season 4, Episode 9 ''The Devil You Know''
Scarface/Anthony - Played by David Valcin
